title-part.text: REARING OR BREEDING ANIMALS, NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR

note.note-paragraph: This subclass covers: - equipment for the care, culture or rearing of all animals, or for obtaining their products, unless provided for elsewhere,e.g. milking A01J, shoeing animals A01L, veterinary devices A61D, culture of animal cells C12M, C12N; - methods of breeding animals or new animal breeds.

title-part.text: Animal husbandry in general, especially cattle-raising

reference.text: devices in connection with harnesses B68B
building construction, features of buildings E04; ventilating buildings F24F
devices for fastening animals A01K1/06; pasturing enclosures A01K3/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Rotary, round or circular animal barns
Air-conditioning, e.g. ventilation, of animal housings
Construction of air inlets or outlets in roofs
Construction of air inlets or outlets in walls
Arrangement of heaters or heat exchangers
Animal shelters especially adapted for keeping young cattle, i.e. calves
Animal shelters or barns especially adapted for keeping horses

reference.text: treating manure A01C3/00; treatment of water, waste water, sewage or sludge C02F

CPC-specific-text.text: Cat trays; Dog urinals; Toilets for pets
Litter boxes with screens for separating excrement from litter
with conveying belts for removing excrement
adapted to fit on conventional toilets
by means of scrapers or the like moving continuously
by means of scrapers or the like moving to-and-fro or step-by-step
by means of a moving piston
by means of manure-loaders, manure-ramps or manure-elevators associated with in-house removal systems
Feeding pens for pigs or cattle
Transport boxes, bags, cages, baskets, harnesses for animals; Fittings therefor

reference.text: for poultry A01K31/002; for pigeons A01K31/07

CPC-specific-text.text: Boxes, bags, cages, baskets, harnesses especially adapted for transport in or on automobiles
Boxes, bags, cages, baskets, harnesses especially adapted for transport in or on bicycles or motorcycles
Boxes, bags, cages, baskets, harnesses especially adapted for carrying the animal on the body of a person

CPC-specific-text.text: Cages for laboratory animals; Cages for measuring metabolism of animals

reference.text: for poultry A01K31/005, A01K31/17, A01K39/00; for birds A01K31/06

CPC-specific-text.text: by means of grids with or without movable locking bars
Devices for immobilisation or restraint of animals, e.g. chutes

CPC-specific-text.text: e.g. associated with enclosures or troughs

CPC-specific-text.text: Grids for preventing cattle from straying

title-part.text: Feeding devices for stock or game

reference.text: A01K1/10 takes precedence; for poultry A01K39/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Fodder distributors with mixer or shredder
with mixing or shredding element rotating on horizontal axis
with mixing or shredding element rotating on vertical axis
where fodder, e.g. bales, is conveyed by conveyor or slide to mixing or shredding elements on transversal and horizontal axes
with mixing or shredding area contained inside an endless chain or belt conveyor
Pet food dispensers; Pet food trays
with means for preventing or catching spillage
with means for preventing other animals or insects from eating

reference.text: automatic identification devices for stock A01K11/006

CPC-specific-text.text: with conveyer belts or the like
for the distribution of liquid fodder
Gravity replenishment from a reserve, e.g. a hopper
dispensing by dosing means actively operated by the animal
dispensing by means of stirring mechanisms or agitators operated by the animal
with access to feeding place or trough only possible through access doors or lids to be opened by the animal
with mechanisms for delivery of measured doses
with timing mechanisms, e.g. pet feeders

title-part.text: Watering equipment for stock or game

CPC-specific-text.text: Drinking bowls with anti-splash or anti-spilling features
e.g. actuated by weight of water; Medication dispensers
Pumps actuated by the drinking animal
Drinking equipment with water heaters, coolers or means for preventing freezing
Devices for mixing solid food with liquids

reference.text: teats for feeding bottles for humans A61J11/00

with means for taking tissue samples, e.g. for DNA analysis
with electronic identification means, e.g. transponders
Branding or tattooing devices for animals
Automatic identification systems for animals, e.g. electronic devices, transponders for animals

reference.text: identification systems for access to feeding pens A01K1/0209; ear tags with electronic identification means A01K11/004

reference.text: as part of the harness B68B5/04

Devices for overturning animals in general

Devices for impeding passage of animals under fences, preventing butting or the like
Electronic training devices specially adapted for dogs or cats
Chewable toys, e.g. for dental care of pets
Exercising equipment, e.g. tread mills, carousels

CPC-specific-text.text: e.g. hobbles or the like; Anti-kicking devices

with pockets or similar for carrying accessories
with electric-shock, sound, magnetic- or radio-waves emitting devices
Monitoring or measuring activity, e.g. detecting heat or mating

title-part.text: Testing, cleaning, stamping or grading eggs

Travelling cages for pigeons; Opening or closing of cages
for poultry or birds, e.g. roosts
e.g. for singing birds or the like
including auxiliary features, e.g. feeding, watering, demanuring, heating, ventilation
including auxiliary features, e.g. feeding, watering, demanuring, heating, ventilation

Other details of beehives, e.g. ventilating devices, entrances to hives, guards, partitions, bee escapes
Appliances for treating beehives or parts thereof, e.g. for cleaning or disinfecting
Feeding or drinking appliances for bees

Artificial reefs specially adapted for the culture of fish

reference.text: filters in general B01D; water treatment in general C02F

reference.text: or lighting apparatus per seF21, H01, H05B
devices for threading fish on strings A22C25/10

title-part.text: Rearing or breeding animals, not otherwise provided for

reference.text: methods for reproduction or fertilisation A61D19/00; medicinal preparations containing sperm A61K35/52; tissue- or animal-cell cultivation apparatus C12M3/00; cultivation or maintenance of tissue or animal cells C12N5/00; mutation or genetic engineering C12N15/00

note.note-paragraph:
In this group the following term is used with the meaning indicated:
- "breeding" means obtaining animals up to and including their
birth or hatching.

reference.text: covering boxes A01K15/00; devices for assisting or preventing mating A01K21/00

note.note-paragraph: Documents relating to new peptides or new DNA or its corresponding mRNA encoding for peptides, and their use for the obtention of transgenic animals, are classified in subclass C07K or in group C12N9/00 according to the peptides, with the appropriate indexing codes]

In group A01K67/027, it is desirable to add the indexing codes of A01K2227/00 and subgroups relating to animals characterised by species. In group A01K67/027 it is desirable to add the indexing codes of A01K2267/00 and subgroups relating to animals characterised by their purpose

CPC-specific-text.text: Chimeric animals, e.g. comprising exogenous cells

note.note-paragraph: In group A01K67/033, it is desirable to add the indexing codes relating to transgenic animals. In group A01K67/033, it is desirable to add the indexing codes relating to animals characterised by their purpose

CPC-specific-text.text: Genetically modified inverterbrates, e.g. transgenic, polyploid
Genetically modified Nematodes, e.g. Caenorhabditis elegans
Genetically modified insects, e.g. Drosophila melanogaster, medfly

title-part.text: Devices for spreading or positioning, e.g. control thereof
for lateral sheering, e.g. trawl boards
Determining the quantity of the catch, e.g. by the pull or drag on the lines
Nets held vertically in the water, e.g. seines
Other catching nets or the like
Methods or means of catching fish in bulk not provided for in groups A01K69/00 to A01K77/00,

CPC-specific-text.text: e.g. fish pumps; Detection of fish; Whale fishery
Attracting or stunning fish; Scaring sharks

title-part.text: Harvesting oysters, mussels, sponges or the like,

CPC-specific-text.text: e.g. drags, clam diggers, marine life collectors

reference.text: weapons, projectiles other than fish-spears F41, F42

title-part.text: Equipment for hunting fish under water
Devices for holding bait on hooks

reference.text: baiting trotlines A01K91/18; non-living bait A01K97/045

title-part.text: with light emission, sound emission, scent dispersal or the like
with means for concealing or protecting hooks, e.g. to prevent entanglement with weeds
with at least one flat rotating body having its axis of rotation substantially non-coincident with the longitudinal axis of the body,
comprising a body rotating around its longitudinal axis, e.g. devons
with flat, or substantially flat, undulating bodies, e.g. spoons
with other than flat, or substantially flat, undulating bodies, e.g. plugs

CPC-specific-text.text: with the line passing through the hollow rod
with built-in accessories, e.g. lighting means or measuring devices

title-part.text: Connecting devices for parts of the rods
Devices for fixing reels on rods

CPC-specific-text.text: Heating devices or other means to protect against the cold
Devices for transferring line to a reel

title-part.text: with pick-up, i.e. with the guiding member rotating and the spool being stationary during normal retrieval of the line

reference.text: devices for fixing on or removing sinkers from lines A01K95/02

title-part.text: for connecting lines to hooks or lures
Fishing booms, i.e. connecting devices spreading out the leaders, e.g. to avoid tangling thereof
Apparatus on lines not otherwise provided for, e.g. automatic hookers

CPC-specific-text.text: Jiggling devices, i.e. devices for moving the lure

title-part.text: Accessories therefor, e.g. baiting devices, lifters, setting reelers
Line length or depth measuring devices
Floats for angling, with or without signalling devices
Devices for fixing on or removing sinkers from lines

CPC-specific-text.text: Ice drilling, hook-setting or signalling devices

title-part.text: Devices for laying ground-bait, e.g chum dispensers,
Containers for live bait kept in water, e.g. for minnows, shrimps
Containers or holders for hooks, lines, sinkers, flies or the like

CPC-specific-text.text: for floats A01K93/02; for ice-fishing A01K97/01; for supports A01K97/10

title-part.text: for removing fish-hooks from the fish
Keepnets or other containers for keeping captured fish
Platforms or seat-boxes specially adapted for angling, e.g. tackle boxes for use as seats
Arrangements for disengaging fish-hooks from obstacles
Methods or apparatus for fishing not provided for in groups A01K69/00 to A01K97/00

title-part.text: Fencing and guiding systems for amphibia
Animals modified by non-integrating nucleic acids, e.g. antisense, RNAi, morpholino, episomal vector, for non-therapeutic purpose
Animals modified by protein administration, for non-therapeutic purpose
Animals modified by administration of exogenous cells

note.note-paragraph: This group covers animals comprising human nucleic acids, proteins or cells. Classification in this group should be done in combination with K01K217 codes.

title-part.text: Animals treated with compounds which are neither proteins nor nucleic acids
Animals modified by environmental factors, e.g. temperature, O2
Animals modified by random mutagenesis, e.g. using ENU, chemicals
Animals comprising random inserted nucleic acids (transgenic)
due to mutation of coding region of the transgene
due to expression of inhibitory nucleic acid, e.g. siRNA, antisense
Animals genetically altered by homologous recombination
maintaining or altering function, i.e. knock in
inducing loss of function, i.e. knock out
heterozygous knock out animals displaying phenotype
Animals comprising multiple alterations of the genome, by transgenesis or homologous recombination, e.g. obtained by cross-breeding
Animal model comprising regulated expression system
Animal model comprising inducible/conditional expression system, e.g. hormones, tet
Animal model comprising tissue-specific expression system, e.g. tissue specific expression of transgene, of Cre recombinase
Animal model comprising expression system for selective cell killing, e.g. toxins, enzyme dependent prodrug therapy using ganciclovir
Animal producing cells or organs for transplantation
Animal model, e.g. for test or diseases
Animal model for neurodegenerative disease, e.g. non- Alzheimer's
Animal model for processes and diseases of the central nervous system, e.g. stress, learning, schizophrenia, pain, epilepsy
Animal model for lipid/glucose metabolism, e.g. obesity, type-2 diabetes
Animal model for diseases of the hematopoietic system
Animal model for diseases of the immune system
Animal model comprising a reporter system for screening tests
